page.title: 01SUMMARY OF GRID AREA
page.content: This area is one of outstanding natural beauty. From Bovisand Bay to {Wembury Beach}there is a very rocky coastline with low cliffs.{Heybrook {Bay}is a modern residential commuter development with mostly detached bungalows.{Down Thomas}is a much older community, mentioned as a manor in the first{Domesday Book}of 1086. There are 5 farms alongside the village street of{Down Thomas,}another farm at{Gabber and two more -{Raneleigh}and{Langdon {Barton.}Mixed farming prevails. The tourist industry is thriving at {Bovisand Bay}with new chalets being built along the cliff-tops, and in the {Church Wood Estate. Langdon Court}is the largest building in the grid area. {Wildlife}abounds on the shore-line and inland.{Wembury's rockpools}are famous for their variety.{Community life}is thriving in this area.
